TopicTitle: Is there a way to just keep certain parts of a mod? Sorry I'm new.

Articles.Content: Ive noticed I use 2 parts of one mod and 3 of another but the rest i don't use. I tried simply deleting the parts but it messes with the parts I wanted to keep. Anyone know how to het around this or if there is a tool or mod?
I would ask in the specific threads for the mods in question.  If it's possible, it's likely going to work differently for each one.
If it is a pure part part, you should be able to delete individual parts, but if it has plugins then it will be more complicated.
If you are ok with just not seeing the parts, Janitor's Closet would help.

Kraden i  was looking to lose the extra parts work with a mac. 

Jason its a mod using models instead of just using mesh = model.mu

Hello new guy.

Thread moved to the modded support subforum.
